title: Takeda global ambitions grow after Shire takeover
text:
Takeda global ambitions grow after Shire takeover 9:47pm IST - 01:25
Takeda Pharmaceutical hopes that their $62 billion deal to purchase Shire will make them a global bio-pharmaceutical leader. But as Silvia Antonioli reports, it comes with a heavy debt burden.
Takeda Pharmaceutical hopes that their $62 billion deal to purchase Shire will make them a global bio-pharmaceutical leader. But as Silvia Antonioli reports, it comes with a heavy debt burden. //reut.rs/2G0FgRz
